    • setCardOpacity

      void setCardOpacity​(String name, double opacity)
      Sets the opacity of the card in case of game over of a single player
      Parameters:
      name - is the player's name
      opacity - indicates the level of opacity desired

    • updateCards

      public void updateCards​(String[] godsList, String[] playersList, PlayerColor[] colorsList)
      Sets the cards on the left side of the scene depending on the number of players, their names, colors and gods chosen. The lists given as parameters are in matching corresponding order
      Parameters:
      godsList - is the list of gods
      playersList - is the list of players' names
      colorsList - is the list of colors

    • updatePlaceWorker

      public void updatePlaceWorker​(Sex sex, Sex[][] alreadyOccupied)
      Enables or disables the tiles depending on the presence of other players.
      Parameters:
      sex - is the sex of the worker that the player is positioning on the board
      alreadyOccupied - is the matrix of workers already on the board

    • updatePower

      public void updatePower()
      Shows and enables the toggle button for the choice of the power

    • updateWin

      public void updateWin​(String winner, String loser)
      Sets the victory message showing the winner god
      Parameters:
      winner - is the winner
      loser - is the loser, if there is any. Otherwise, is an empty string

    • updateLose

      public void updateLose​(String winner, String[] losers)
      Sets the losing message
      Parameters:
      winner - is the winner name, if there is any. In this case, it shows the winner god. Otherwise, if there is no winner, it is an empty string
      losers - is the list of all the losers names, whose cards will be set with opacity, in order to immediately recognize who is no longer in the game

    • restart

      public void restart()
      Lets the game restart with the IP request.

    • onClickTile

      public void onClickTile​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
      Enables the interaction with a tile, depending on the game phase and the status of the tile (enabled or disables)
      Parameters:
      e - is the mouse event of the click

    • onClickSubmitPower

      public void onClickSubmitPower​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Sends the information about the willingness of using the power
      Parameters:
      e - is the action event of the click on the submit button

    • getTileByIndex

      public javafx.scene.Node getTileByIndex​(int x, int y, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane gridPane)
      Gets the tile depending on its column and row indexes.
      Parameters:
      x - is the column index
      y - is the row index
      gridPane - is the gridPane selected
      Returns:
      the right tile

    • updateAndSaveBoard

      public void updateAndSaveBoard​(SlimBoard slimBoard)
      Saves and prints the changed tiles of the updated board
      Parameters:
      slimBoard - is the slimboard received from the server

    • updatePlayAction

      public void updatePlayAction​(RequestAction request)
      Updates the worker's choice depending on the possible actions.
      Parameters:
      request - Action to be managed.
